rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious, airy open-plan area combining the kitchen and living room in a bohemian style with vibrant colors, reclaimed wood finishes, exposed brick walls, and industrial-chic elements. Vastu principles are incorporated by aligning the entrance towards the North-East for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom featuring Bohemian decor with eclectic textiles, layered rugs, natural lighting through large windows aligned with Vastu's principles for promoting calmness. The headboard is positioned to avoid direct alignment with the door as per traditional practices.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: An elegantly designed bathroom with a combination of modern fixtures and bohemian touches. The placement ensures privacy while aligning with Vastu recommendations for water elements.

rooms.name: Closet/Storage
rooms.description: A compact storage space integrated into the living area for efficient use of space while keeping clutter away from the main areas, following local norms for functionality and design.

openings.description: The entrance is designed to be inviting with a large door complemented by a vestibule that reflects the bohemian aesthetic, ensuring an energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
A well-appointed balcony offering outdoor space and enhancing ventilation. The location is chosen for its calming effect and adherence to local building norms.
